name: Attuned_Entomb_C
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Reduces recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Recharge and Reduces Endurance Cost
